comments:
Actually it is impossible to draw neither provided nor required interface links from ports to interfaces. 

The main problem with these links is that port provided/required interfaces are both derived features. 

Say, the set of provided interfaces of the port is defined by the set of interfaces implemented by port's type classifier. 

Thus creation of the link on diagram is not related to port itself, but should modify the typing classifier of this port or one of its super-classes.

This request looks like duplicate of #161874, isn't it? #161874 is marked as fixed. 
I used UML2Tools 0.8.0 M3:
Provided Interface from Port to Interface is created with no problem. Trial to create Required Interface throws Exception:
